price: ߊ߬ ߞߵߊ߬ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߟߊ߫ ߡߊ߲߬ߕߊ߬ߣߌ߲߬ߓߊ ߟߎ߬ ߘߏ߫ ߟߎ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߛߎߋ߫
arabic: لَقَدۡ رَأَىٰ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِ رَبِّهِ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: laqad raā min āyāti rabbihi al-kub'rā
